title: Elections & The Fight
subtitle: Take pledges, land knockouts, rate threats, and hold power accountable.

steps.title: Open Elections
steps.description: Click "Elections" in the main navigation bar. This is the Elections 2026 hub — tracking threats to democracy, citizen pledges, and races that matter.
steps.alt: Elections 2026 landing page with threat count and citizen stats

steps.title: Go to The Fight
steps.description: Click "The Fight" in the sub-navigation. This is where citizens take pledges and land knockouts — concrete civic actions you commit to before Election Day.
steps.alt: The Fight page showing pledges on the left and knockouts on the right

steps.title: Take a pledge
steps.description: On the left column, check the boxes next to pledges you commit to — like "I will vote in Nov 2026" or "I will register voters." Each pledge you take earns civic points and lights up an arrow.
steps.alt: Pledge checkboxes with green checks and lit arrows

steps.title: Land a knockout
steps.description: On the right column, check off knockouts as you achieve them — like "Registered someone else to vote" or "Rep changed position publicly." These are real-world results that prove your pledge.
steps.alt: Knockout checkboxes on the right side of the grid

steps.title: Rate threats
steps.description: Click "Threats" in the sub-navigation to see executive threats to democracy ranked by severity. Rate each threat and share it so others can see what's happening.
steps.alt: Threats page showing severity-ranked executive threats

steps.title: Join the community stream
steps.description: Scroll down on The Fight page to find the Community Stream. Post ideas, share evidence, and discuss what the Golden Rule demands right now. This is where citizens think together.
steps.alt: Community Stream section on The Fight page with input area
